DOC.brief_title: Comparison DSCT With IB-IVUS Angiography Assessment Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study : 1 . To compare contrast angiography , ability DSCT detect quantify coronary artery stenosis . 2 . To compare gray-scale IVUS , ability DSCT quantify plaque cross-sectional diameter & area measurement & plaque volume . 3 . To evaluate ability DSCT ass plaque morphology quantify plaque component compare gray-scale IB-IVUS . 4 . To evaluate ability DSCT identify & measure lesion remodel compare gray-scale IVUS . 5 . To determine pre-PCI evaluation coronary plaque morphology IB-IVUS ) predict procedural success assess adequate stent strut apposition expansion b ) peri-procedural myocardial necrosis measure biomarker elevation .
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant female > / = 18 year age Scheduled coronary angiography Acute STelevation myocardial infarction within last 72 hour Current congestive heart failure Current cardiogenic shock Unstable clinical condition Known cardiomyopathy ( EF < 30 % ) Creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL Definite allergy iodinate contrast medium Current participation investigational drug device research study HR > 65 contraindication administration beta blocker Exclusion criterion assess catheterization procedure PCI native coronary vessel perform Left main stenosis > 50 % Any vessel contraindicate IVUS image Any lesion contraindicate IVUS image Inability pas IVUS catheter PCI bifurcation lesion
